name: SDL Translation Memory File
summary: Learn about .SLDTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SLDTM files are used for storing the progress as more translations are identified and added to the translation memory. The saved data can then be used for suggesting translation matches or automatically translating text.
NOTE: SLDTM files are used by SDL Trados Studio 2009 and later.

description: Data file created by SDL Trados Studio language translation software; stores a "translation memory," which is a linguistic database that saves translation data as a user translates written information; includes "100% matches" as well as "fuzzy matches."
